title: Saraki Lines Up Grand Counsel To Tackle CCB
content:
Following the issuance of an arrest warrant by the Code Of Conduct Tribunal CCT for failing to show up for his trial for alleged false declaration of assets the Senate President has reportedly set up a grand counsel of 12 senior lawyers

 

According to reports has employed the services of 12 senior lawyers led by the former President of the Nigerian Bar Association NBA JB Daudu SAN to represent him before the court

 

Although the report is yet to be independently confirmed it is safe to say that the last has not been heard from Saraki and the CCT

  The post appeared first on The Trent
